content:
Coming across Lean while studying for my undergrad, I thought it could be really cool if I could verify proofs in Lean, then process the proof to generate latex equations and text (basically turn the proof to be human readable). The end goal here is to solve home assignments in Lean :sunglasses:

I am certain somebody thought of that already. Do anyone know about such thing?
People thought of that of course, but it doesn't exist yet. I hope it will exist soonish (in Lean 4).
oh man hope I don't finish my degree by then lol
Guy has marked this topic as resolved.
